examine_trade_records.title: The Paper Trail
examine_trade_records.description: Trader Kess hands you ledgers and shipping manifests: 'Look at these prices - they're selling crystals for less than extraction costs! No legitimate business can sustain that. And here,' she points to a communication crystal, 'threats to suppliers who work with independents. This isn't competition, it's economic warfare.'

choices.text: 'This is clear evidence of illegal practices.'
'We need to present this to the Root Assembly.'
'Help me understand - how are they funding these losses?'
